lines.content: * Represents a deadline given by a description and due date.

* Gets the due date of the task.
* @return String representation of the due date in the format yyyy-MM-dd.
public Event(String description, String from, String to) {

* Represents the main class for the Diablo chatbot.
* Represents the main logic used by the chatbot, and is used to jumpstart the chatbot.
Task event = new Event(parsedInput[1], parsedInput[2], parsedInput[3]);
* Initialises the Diablo class and starts the chatbot.
* Takes a string and parses it based on the input logic of Diablo, returning a string array with the required
* @return String array containing the parsed contents of the string.
return new String[] {"deadline", "-1", "Please indicate a deadline!"};
return new String[] {"deadline", "-1", "Please write the date in the format yyyy-mm-dd"};
return new String[] {"todo", "-1", "Please include something you want to do!"};
return new String[] {"event", "-1", "Please include both /from and /to dates!"};
return new String[] {"event", "-1", "Please write the dates in the format yyyy-mm-dd"};
return new String[] {"event", description, from, to};

* Contains and manages the task list for the chatbot.
* Adds a task to the task list.
* Marks a task as done. Will throw a DiabloException if the list does not have a task with the task number.
* @param taskNumber The position of the task in the list.
* @return String representation of the completed task.
* @throws DiabloException If the list does not have a task with the task number.
public String mark(int taskNumber) throws DiabloException {
throw new DiabloException("Invalid task number! Check your tasks again.");
* Deletes a task from the list. Will throw a DiabloException if the list does not have a task with the task number.
* @param taskNumber The position of the task in the list.
* @return String representation of the deleted task.
* @throws DiabloException If the list does not have a task with the task number.
public String delete(int taskNumber) throws DiabloException {
throw new DiabloException("Invalid task number! Check your tasks again.");
* Filters tasks based on their description and a given key, and returns an ArrayList of filtered tasks as strings.
* @param key String to find in each task description.
* @return ArrayList of filtered tasks as strings.
* Formats the current task list for the Ui to receive and print out.
* @return ArrayList of string representations of the tasks.
* Formats the current task list for storage into a text file.
* @return ArrayList of string representations of the tasks in storage format.
* Acts as an interim between the user and the chatbot. Responds to user interactions with inbuilt messages.
private final String GREETING = "\tHello! I'm " + BOT_NAME + "\n\tWhat can I do for you?";
private final String EXIT = "\tBye. Hope to see you again soon!";
* Scans for the next line of input from the user.
* Greets the user with an inbuilt greeting.
* Says goodbye to the user with an inbuilt message.
* Prints out all current tasks that are stored in the chatbot currently.
* @param tasks ArrayList of string representation of tasks.
System.out.println("\tThere are no list items yet!");
* Prints an error message related to reading data from the storage file.
System.out.println("\tAn error occured when reading data. Try again!");
* Prints an error message in the chatbot given by a DiabloException.
* @param e An exception containing a message to be delivered to the user.
* Prints an error message in the case that the input does not meet chatbot requirements.
System.out.println("\t" + "I don't know what that means!!!");
* Prints a message to the user telling them that a specific task was added to the task list.
* @param task String representation of a Task object.
System.out.println("\tGot it. I've added this task:\n\t\t" + task);
* Prints a message to the user telling them a specific task in the task list was marked complete.
* @param task String representation of a Task object.
System.out.println("\tNice! I've marked this task as done:\n\t\t" + task);
* Prints a message to the user telling them a specific task was deleted from the task list.
* @param task String representation of a Task object.
System.out.println("\t Alright, I've removed this task:\n\t\t" + task);
* Prints a horizontal line that acts as a divider for chatbot and user messages.
String[] output = Parser.parse("deadline i wanna go home");
String[] output = Parser.parse("deadline i wanna go home /by 19 January 2024");
assertEquals("Please write the date in the format yyyy-mm-dd", output[2]);
String[] output = Parser.parse("deadline i wanna go home /by ");
assertEquals("Please write the date in the format yyyy-mm-dd", output[2]);
assertEquals("Invalid task number! Check your tasks again.", e.getMessage());
